description.value: Code system of concepts specifying whether or not the service (pharmaceutical) is in the formulary. Used in HL7 Version 2.x messaging in the OM7 segment.

purpose.value: Underlying Master Code System for V2 table 0473 (Formulary Status)

copyright.value: Copyright HL7. Licensed under creative commons public domain

display.value: This observation/service is on the formulary, and has guidelines

definition.value: This observation/service is on the formulary, and has guidelines

display.value: This observation/service is not on the formulary

definition.value: This observation/service is not on the formulary

display.value: This observation/service is on the formulary, but is restricted

definition.value: This observation/service is on the formulary, but is restricted

display.value: This observation/service is on the formulary

definition.value: This observation/service is on the formulary
